summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4603 for the improvement of the alley in block 15, plan of North Seattle, being the alley from West Harrison Street to West Republican Street, between 1st Avenue West and 2nd Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53580, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
